content: double_crochet in next 5 single_crochet * 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 double_crochet in the last single_crochet repeat row 4-9 until piece measures about 54 repeat row 4-7 once more work row 4 once more last row rs with cc chain 3 2 treble_crochet in first single_crochet *treble_crochet in the next 5 single_crochet skip the next 2 single_crochet treble_crochet in the next 5 single_crochet * 3 treble_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 treble_crochet in last single_crochet finish off copyright © 2012 by patti gonsalves page 1 of 1
